Product Gaps: Invoice approval workflows, Multi-entity invoice processing, Invoice import/export capabilities, Automated invoice routing, Invoice templates and customization

Description: #CORE. Manual invoice data entry with field validation, duplicate checking, and GL account validation. Supports header/line entry with flexible distribution.
#EXPEDITED. Streamlined invoice entry for immediate payment processing, bypassing accrual. Used for urgent payments, petty cash, and one-time disbursements.
#CORE. Automated matching of invoices to POs and receipts. Configurable matching rules, tolerances (price, quantity), and exception routing.
#WORKFLOW. Configurable approval routing based on amount, GL account, department, vendor, or custom rules. Supports parallel, serial, and conditional approvals with budget checking.
#EXCEPTION HANDLING. System and user-defined holds for invoices requiring review. Exception workflows for matching failures, budget overruns, and compliance issues.
Links to Details: part of the invoice approval workflow

L4 Name: Credit Memos, Debit Memos, Negative Invoices & Adjustments
Description: #ADJUSTMENTS. Process vendor credits, returns, price adjustments, and invoice corrections. Support for negative invoices and GL adjustments with proper accounting treatment.
Links to Details: credit memos will be part of vendor portal but we should be able to adjust it against an invoice payment and ability to issue debit notes

Description: #LIFECYCLE. Complete invoice lifecycle management including void, cancel, delete, close, and reopen capabilities with proper GL reversals and audit trail.
#AUTOMATION. Automated creation of recurring invoices based on schedules (monthly, quarterly, etc.). Template-based generation with configurable date and amount logic.
#FRAUD PREVENTION. Real-time duplicate detection using vendor, invoice number, amount, and date. Configurable matching rules with manual override capability.
#SPECIAL INVOICES. Process prepayments and advance payments with proper accounting treatment. Track prepayment balances and automatic application to final invoices.
Links to Details: research and see if this can be moved to Next or later or not to do

Description: #CALCULATIONS. Automated calculation and distribution of freight, tax, and discounts across invoice lines. Supports multiple tax jurisdictions and discount terms.
#CONSTRUCTION/CONTRACTS. Calculate and track withholding and retainage amounts per contract or vendor rules. Support automatic release based on milestones or percentages.
#ACCOUNTING. Flexible GL distribution with split allocation across multiple accounts, funds, departments, and projects. Support for templates and default distributions.
#INQUIRY. Real-time tracking of invoice balances including amounts invoiced, paid, credited, and outstanding. Drill-down to transaction detail and payment history.
#AUDIT. Complete audit trail of all invoice transactions including creates, updates, approvals, and payments. Field-level change tracking with user/date/time stamps.
#INTEGRATION. Bi-directional integration with Purchasing for PO data, invoice creation from PO, PO balance updates, and encumbrance synchronization.
#INTEGRATION. Integration with Receiving for GRN data, automatic invoice creation from receipt, and three-way match processing.
#INTEGRATION. Real-time or batch posting to GL with configurable account mapping, period control, and encumbrance accounting. Support for pre-encumbrance and accrual entries.
#INTEGRATION. Link invoices to contracts for spend tracking, compliance monitoring, and contract balance management. Support for contract terms and pricing validation.
#INTEGRATION. Allocate invoice costs to projects with task/phase breakdown. Support for project billing, cost tracking, and budget management.
#INTEGRATION. Automatic asset creation from qualifying invoices. Asset information capture and synchronization with Fixed Assets module for depreciation.
#DATA IMPORT. Bulk import of invoices from Excel, CSV, or other systems. Template-based import with validation, error handling, and preview capability.
#INTEGRATION. REST APIs and integration points for external systems including refund invoices from Payroll/HCM, UB/AR/CR, and third-party applications.
#PAYMENT SCHEDULING. Split invoice into multiple scheduled payments with separate due dates. Support for installment plans, milestone payments, and progress billing.
#REPORTING. Comprehensive invoice reporting including aging, registers, exception reports, and drill-down inquiry capabilities with export options.
#SECURITY. Comprehensive security for invoice processing including role-based access control, data masking for PII/sensitive data, field-level security, and segregation of duties controls.
#DATA MANAGEMENT. Automated archival of closed invoices per retention policies. Compressed storage with retrieval capability for audit and legal hold requirements.
#BUDGET CONTROL. Real-time budget availability checking at invoice entry and approval. Encumbrance creation, tracking, and liquidation with fund accounting support.

Product Gaps: Advanced OCR/AI invoice capture, Multi-format invoice ingestion, Vendor portal invoice submission, Capture accuracy and confidence scoring

Description: #AUTOMATION. AI-powered OCR to extract data from invoice images/PDFs. Machine learning for field recognition with confidence scoring and validation.
#HARDWARE. Direct integration with network and desktop scanners. Scan-to-inbox workflow with automatic invoice detection and processing.
#MOBILE. Mobile app for iOS/Android to capture invoices via camera. Real-time upload and processing with on-device preview and validation.
#AI/ML. Continuous machine learning from user corrections. Auto-suggestion for GL coding, vendor matching, and distribution based on historical patterns.
#VENDOR PORTAL. Self-service portal for vendors to submit invoices electronically. Automated validation and routing to AP with status tracking for vendors.
#EMAIL. Dedicated email inbox for invoice submission. Automatic email parsing, attachment extraction, and OCR processing with intelligent routing.
#EDI. Electronic Data Interchange (EDI 810/EDIFACT INVOIC) for automated invoice receipt from suppliers. Standards-based integration with mapping and validation.
#3RD PARTY. Integration with Bill.com for invoice receipt, approval, and payment processing. Bi-directional sync for invoice and payment data.
#MONITORING. Dashboard and reports for capture performance, accuracy rates, processing volumes, and exception tracking with trend analysis.
#SECURITY. Security controls for capture channels including portal access, email authentication, and OCR queue permissions with audit logging.

Product Gaps: Payment automation and scheduling, Multi-currency payment support, Automated payment matching, Payment batch processing optimization, Warrant processing for government

Description: #CONFIGURATION. Setup and maintain bank accounts for disbursements. Configure account numbers, routing, check stock, and payment method assignment by account.
#CONFIGURATION. Configure payment methods and assignment rules. Default methods by vendor, amount threshold, or invoice type with override capability.
#CORE. Select invoices for payment based on due date, discount date, vendor, GL account, or custom criteria. Group into payment batches for processing.
#AUTOMATION. Automated scheduled payments based on due dates. Support for recurring payment schedules with automatic batch creation and processing.
#CHECK. Print checks with MICR encoding, signatures, and stub detail. Generate positive pay files for fraud prevention with manual and automatic transmission.
#ACH. Generate NACHA-compliant ACH files (CCD/CTX) for electronic payments. Support for prenotes, NOC handling, and return processing (R-codes).
#WIRE. Process domestic and international wire transfers. Support for SWIFT, Fedwire with beneficiary information and purpose codes.

L4 Name: Credit Card & Virtual Card Payment Processing
Description: #CARD. Process payments via corporate credit cards and virtual card numbers. Integration with card providers and reconciliation support.

L4 Name: Manual Check & External Payment Recording (online + import)
Description: #MANUAL RECORDING. Record payments made outside the system (manual checks, wires, ACH). Support for one-time payees, citizen refunds, and bulk import.
#WORKFLOW. Approval workflow for payment batches based on amount, GL account, or custom rules. Support for parallel/serial approvals with delegation and mobile access.
#EXECUTION. Final payment processing and disbursement. Update invoice status, create accounting entries, and generate payment confirmations with audit trail.
#ACCOUNTING. Create GL journal entries for payments. Cash account credits, AP liability debits, discount recognition, and encumbrance liquidation.
#GOVERNMENT. Inter-fund payments and transfers with due-to/due-from accounting. Consolidated cash management across funds with automatic clearing entries.
#COMMUNICATION. Generate and deliver remittance advice to vendors. Email, print, and vendor portal delivery with invoice detail and payment information.

L4 Name: Payment Void, Stop, Cancel, Reversal and Undo
Description: #LIFECYCLE. Void issued payments, stop checks, cancel electronic payments, and reverse GL entries. Support for partial voids and reissue capability.
#AUDIT. Complete payment audit trail with all transaction history, approvals, voids, and changes. Immutable logging for compliance and audit support.
#REPORTING. Comprehensive payment reporting including check registers, ACH files, wire summaries, and cash requirements. Drill-down inquiry with export capability.
#SECURITY. Comprehensive payment security including role-based access control, data masking, payment file encryption at rest, dual custody controls, and PCI-DSS/SOC 2 compliance.
#DATA MANAGEMENT. Automated archival of payment history per retention policies. Support for check images, ACH files, and remittance with retrieval for audit and legal hold.

Product Gaps: Direct bank API integrations, Real-time payment status, Payment file encryption and security, Automated payment reconciliation

Description: #CONFIGURATION. Configure bank connections for API and file-based integration. Setup authentication, endpoints, file formats, and transmission schedules.
#PRINTER. Integration with network and local printers for automated check printing. Support for multiple check stocks, alignment, and print job management.

L4 Name: Direct Bank API Integration for Real-Time Payments
Description: #BANK API. Real-time payment initiation via bank APIs. Support for FedNow, RTP (Real-Time Payments), same-day ACH, and instant wire transfers.
#FILE AUTOMATION. Automated generation and transmission of payment files (ACH, wire, positive pay). Scheduled file delivery via SFTP/FTPS with encryption.
#FRAUD PREVENTION. Automated positive pay file generation and transmission to bank. Real-time exception alerts and automated reconciliation of cashed checks.
#3RD PARTY. Integration with payment aggregators (Stripe, Square, PayPal) for alternative payment methods and reconciliation.
#BILL.COM. Bi-directional integration with Bill.com for payment processing. Export payment batches and import confirmation and status updates.
#VENDOR PORTAL. Post payment and remittance information to vendor portal. Allow vendors to view payment status, remittances, and download documentation.
#MONITORING. Dashboard and reporting for integration health, transaction volumes, errors, and SLA compliance with alerting and troubleshooting tools.
#SECURITY. Security controls for integrations including API key management, encryption, access logging, and compliance with PCI-DSS and data protection standards.
#CONFIGURATION. System-wide 1099 configuration including form types (MISC/NEC/DIV/INT), box mapping, payment codes, tax codes, thresholds, and multi-entity setup.
#VENDOR SETUP. Vendor-level 1099 eligibility, W-9 capture and validation, TIN verification, and exemption management with automated TIN matching via IRS bulk API.
#TRACKING. Track 1099-eligible payments throughout the year. Automatic box assignment, threshold monitoring, multi-entity support, and real-time balance inquiry.
#REPORTING. Generate 1099 forms (MISC/NEC/DIV/INT) for vendor and IRS copies. On-demand and bulk generation with preview, validation, and batch printing.

L4 Name: IRS IRIS E-File Integration & TIN matching
Description: #IRS FILING. Electronic filing to IRS via IRIS portal. Support for original filings, corrections, extensions, Combined Federal/State (CF/SF), and bulk TIN matching.
#3RD PARTY FILING. Integration with third-party 1099 filing services (TaxBandit, Tax1099, Sovos, ADP). Export data and import filing confirmations.
#CORRECTIONS. Void and reissue 1099 forms, file corrections with IRS, update TIN information, and restate amounts with proper audit trail.
#BACKUP WITHHOLDING. Process IRS B-Notices, automatically withhold at 24%, generate First/Second B-Notices, and track TIN correction status.
#FOREIGN TAX. 1042/1042-S reporting for foreign vendors. Tax treaty management, FATCA compliance, W-8 form capture, and foreign tax withholding.
#ESCHEATMENT. Identify dormant payments and unclaimed property. Apply state-specific aging rules, track owner information, and classify property types.
#ESCHEATMENT REPORTING. Due-diligence letters to owners, address verification, NAUPA III file generation, and state-specific remittance reporting.
#AUDIT & REPORTING. Comprehensive 1099 and escheatment audit reports. Compliance dashboards, exception tracking, IRS correspondence log, and historical archives.
#SECURITY. Role-based access control for 1099 functions with data masking, PII protection, security by tax year and entity, and segregation of duties for filing and corrections.
#DATA MANAGEMENT. Long-term retention of 1099 data per IRS and state requirements (7+ years). Archived 1099 retrieval, legal hold, and secure storage.

Product Gaps: Real-time AP dashboards, Predictive analytics and forecasting, Custom dashboard creation, Mobile dashboard access, AP performance benchmarking

Description: #VENDOR ANALYTICS. Analyze vendor spend concentration, payment frequency, compliance risk, and performance. Support for duplicate vendor detection and supplier oversight.
#DASHBOARDS. Real-time AP dashboards with key performance indicators. Track open invoices, payments, approval bottlenecks, aging, and process efficiency.
#VISUALIZATIONS. Interactive charts and graphs for AP data. Trend analysis, period comparisons, drill-down capabilities, and visual analytics for insights.
#CUSTOM REPORTING. User-defined reports and ad-hoc queries. Drag-drop report builder with saved templates, scheduling, and distribution capabilities.
#BI INTEGRATION. Integration with external BI tools (Power BI, Tableau, Excel). ODBC/REST API access for real-time data feeds and warehouse integration.
#TRANSPARENCY. Open checkbook API for public spend transparency. CSV/JSON export with privacy filters, GFOA transparency alignment, and public portal integration.
#DOCUMENT MANAGEMENT. Centralized document repository for AP. Full-text search, indexing, version control, and secure storage with retrieval capabilities.
#COMPLIANCE. Legal hold management for AP documents. Retention schedules, immutable storage, audit/public records export packages, and e-discovery support.
